column2: vastly overrated.  The food here was creative and interesting but at $30 a dish for a few bites
column3: it's hardly worth the price.  Additionally
column4: I couldn't stand the presentation.  Each dish was brought out by some bearded
column6: Austin-y guy who gave a talk about how "super awesome" the dish was.  At those prices
column7: I want to be the judge of whether it is awesome or not.  They could really do without the editorializing.  It rubbed me the wrong way.  Although the food was decent
column8: I doubt I will ever return here.  There are better places to spend $200 on dinner.
